_header: In the name of the Holy Trinity
_description:
Alchemical verses: the order of God’s universe a justification for the Philosopher’s Stone — eleven couplets (Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 856)

BLHar2407.First Lines: In the name of the holi trinitenow send ws grase so hyt be…
BLHar2407.Last Lines: …god sende ws parte of thys secreteand of that heuen þat ys so sweȝt amen
BLHar2407.Editions:
Ashmole,  Elias. 
             Theatrum Chemicum Britannicum.
         London: J. Grimond, 1652: 211.
